name: Project: Kaiju
description:
This is a prototype made for college course work (the class called Rapid Prototyping at Johnson Counting Community College).

The Assignment was simply 2 requirements. Giant monster and lots of collateral damage.

A video Presentation on this prototype can be found on my YouTube channel.

Destroying the buildings = points.

Getting hit with missiles = death

knocking the missile out of the sky = death beam charge

Green thing-a-ma-doos = health

Note:
This game requires a PC and a Windows (xbox360) Gamepad. It is not mapped for Mac, though there are 3rd party drivers that might help...

Remixed the soundtrack myself:

https://www.mixcloud.com/DJ_NPC/kaiju-attack-kaiju...
